1187680.name: Trainz 2019 DLC - Tidewater Point Railroad 3.0
1187680.description:
Tidewater Railroad is a shortline railroad running from a crude oil terminal located south by the river to an intermodal terminal in the North. Extra CSX and Norfolk Southern traffic also use the 9 mile sprint to the looping yard at Tidewater station.

Sessions Include:

Container delivery
Welcome to the Tidewater Valley! We've got some intermodal to deal with in this session.

Old grain terminal
It's summertime here in the Tidewater Valley! In this session we'll be working with the grain elevators along the line.

Shunting work
It's a warm Spring afternoon and you're in charge of assembling the Northbound local. Prepare to assemble your train and switch out the industries along the line.
1187680.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 简体中文
